extendedInfo.description: San Francisco Bay Area Local Guide: - Calendar of EVENTS (culture, art, social, technology and sports)- Food Trucks (map and tweets of most food trucks in the area)- ART galleries (browse vernissage of your local artists)- augmented reality camera view of point of interests around youMany Social Features:- follow your favorite events on Twitter with #hashtags already included, - share using Facebook, Email, Google+, SMS and other applicationsAre you a visiting tourist? - this is a great application to walk around the city and read the descriptions of the famous buildings and monumentsHungry, and tired of local selection?- we are following all major food trucks in the city, make sure to tweet with geo-location enabled and we will should your posts on the map!

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: Limited event listing,  force close on compass.  Wish it had more events and covered more bay area cities.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix.
reviews.comment: Clicked on Events and all I see is a blank white page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful app for finding events around San Francisco.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work.  Looks promising at opening, but then provides zero info on activities, food trucks or what\'s local.  Pretty pictures of the bridge is all it has going.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great coverage of SF events. And Vernissage with Bay Area photography looks awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: I love the food trucks. The building descriptions are also a lot of fun
reviews.author: A Google User
